title: The Resurrection just in time for Easter 2015
post: Obviously whoever wrote the title does not know the difference between resurrection and ascension.  It would be interesting to see if the producer does research on the Shroud.  The storyline does not appear to include the Shroud, though that would be very interesting to add to the fictional story.
author: Andy Weiss
